targets.expr: (sum(node_namespace_pod_container:container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:sum_irate{ namespace="$namespace2", pod="$soakpod"}) by (pod) / sum(cluster:namespace:pod_cpu:active:kube_pod_container_resource_limits{ namespace="$namespace2", pod="$soakpod"}) by (pod)) * 100

(sum(node_namespace_pod_container:container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:sum_irate{ namespace="$namespace2", pod="$spillpod"}) by (pod) / sum(cluster:namespace:pod_cpu:active:kube_pod_container_resource_limits{ namespace="$namespace2", pod="$spillpod"}) by (pod)) * 100
sum by(namespace) (container_memory_working_set_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", namespace="$namespace1", container!="POD", image!=""})
sum by(namespace) (container_memory_working_set_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", namespace="$namespace2", container!="POD", image!=""})
